buffs.description: Tribe Friendliness for Orc can be increased up to 600 by Siren.
buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and it makes the Skill Attack faster.
Increases basic game speed by 7% and increases its attack range and movement speed by 7%.
Increases attack range, movement speed and critical damage of all units by 5%.
Tribe Friendliness for Orc can be increased up to 600 by Siren.
description.skill1: Increases the Tribe Friendliness for Orc (30%, 60%, 90%, 120%, 150%)
description.skill2: Increase attack power of Orc units in Outland Battle. (0%, 0%, 4%, 7%, 14%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Siren ]
